title: Can not browse the store
body: I can not buy any champion or skin when I used my macbook with iPhone personal hotspot.Even browsed the store that did not show anything.

replies.body:
Hey kingfly,

Please try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article) and see if that resolves your issues!
I'm using OX system and the website which you gave me that is for the other system. Thanks
I believe the repair feature should be located in the same place in your client, though. Are you able to find it?
